song.title: Come, Spirit of Power
song.lyrics:
[C] Come Spirit come. Come Spirit of power. Come fill our hearts with your fire. Come Spirit come.
[V1] O Spirit You know our hearts. O Spirit You guide our path. You love us despite our sin. Spirit fill our life.
[V2] O Spirit console our grief, O Breath of God heal our lives. You give us true hope and peace. Spirit fill our life.
[V3] Spirit give us your strength. Come Spirit of holiness. Come name of the Father’s love Spirit fill our life.
[V4] O Spirit you give us light. O Spirit dispel the night. You teach us to choose what’s right Spirit fill our life.
